name: Converge Executive Search
overview:
Converge Executive Search is a full-service executive search firm specializing in retained search for executives and management in technology.

With offices in both San Francisco and Atlanta, Converge Search works with clients across the country and around the globe. Our team members have extensive experience recruiting for Fortune 500 companies as well as small business clients. With expertise in IT, finance, information systems, sales, marketing, operations, human resources, CEOs and COOs, the search executives at Converge have over thirty years experience, totaling over one hundred and fifty successful completions for both public and private companies.

As a boutique executive search firm, Converge provides its clients with the sophistication and experience offered by large search firms, but with the hands-on service and client devotion that only a smaller business can offer. Through our time-proven search process we identify the highest quality candidates, conduct interviews, and provide thorough reference checks on behalf of our clients. Converge has an impeccable track record of efficiency, success, and client satisfaction.
